title: raamaa raamaa raamaa raamaa
sahitya:
rAma rAma rAma rAma aninanta rAjapu jUpElarA O rAma

caraNam 1

 Eti janmamidi Eti bratuku rAma E mencu konnAvO O rAma
   
caraNam 2

 aTalaina nAdu pATala vinucu mATalDa vendukO O rAma
   
caraNam 3

 sarivArilO nannu karuNa jUci nAdu karmamu baTTa vendukO rAma
   
caraNam 4

 Asakonna nAdu gAsi dIrpalEka vAsi Emi kaligenO O rAma
   
caraNam 5

 dayatO nannu shESa shayana indarilOna nayamu sEya takkuva O rAma
   
caraNam 6

 patita pAvana nIku hitulaina vAri jata gUDaka bOtinA O rAma
   
caraNam 7

 nATi bhaktulu nIkEti vAvulO konca pATi lEka pOyena O rAma
   
caraNam 8

 alanADu nIvAru kolici naTula nADu talapu gAka pOyenA O rAma
   
caraNam 9

 brOci brOvakanu jUci jUDalkanu EcuTakE tOcena O rAma
 
caraNam 10

 O jagada vana sarOja nayana tyAgarAja rakSka suguNa O rAma
